alert.note: Alert for Hamilton (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 28 at 2:01PM CDT until April 28 at 2:30PM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 230 PM CDT FOR CENTRAL HAMILTON COUNTY... At 201 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 7 miles southwest of Hamilton, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Two inch hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Hamilton, Shive, Gentrys Mill, Whiteway, Aleman and Ireland. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 800 PM CDT for central Texas.
